languages.text: "Мы не можем отследить источник активировавшего ее сигнала или выяснить, в чем ее смысл. Техножрецы противятся самой идее изучения данной Процедуры, так как это "нарушает таинство". Предположительно, разумы магосов, погруженные в камеры, участвуют в некоем масштабном вычислении. Слуги Омниссии семикратно испытали когитационную сеть планеты очистительными алгоритмами разной тяжести и признали ее чистой".

"We cannot trace the source of the signal that activated the Procedure or identify its purpose. The Tech-Priests oppose the idea of studying the Procedure, as it 'violates the sacrament.' Supposedly, the minds of the Magi immersed in the cells are involved in some grand-scale computation. The servants of the Omnissiah have tested the planet's cogitational network seven times with purifying algorithms of varying degrees of severity, proclaiming it clean."
languages.original_text: "Мы не можем отследить источник активировавшего ее сигнала или выяснить, в чем ее смысл. Техножрецы противятся самой идее изучения данной Процедуры, так как это "нарушает таинство". Предположительно, разумы магосов, погруженные в камеры, участвуют в некоем масштабном вычислении. Слуги Омниссии семикратно испытали когитационную сеть планеты очистительными алгоритмами разной тяжести и признали ее чистой".

traits.locale_text: "We cannot race the source of the signal that activated it or figure out what it means. The Tech-Priests oppose the idea of researching this Procedure, as it "violates the sacrament". Supposedly, the minds of the magos, immersed in the cells, are involved in some grand-scale computation. The servants of the Omnissiah have tested the cogitational-network with the purifying algorithms of varying degrees of severity seven times and have proclaimed it clean."

"We cannot race the source of the signal that activated it or figure out what it means. The Tech-Priests oppose the idea of researching this Procedure, as it "violates the sacrament". languages.text: “我们无法追踪激活那个程序的信号来源，也无法理解它的含义。技术神甫反对研究这个程序，因为这样的做法‘违反了圣礼’。据推测，那些沉浸在密室里的贤者思维参与了某种大规模的计算活动。欧姆尼塞亚的仆人已经用了多种净化算法对这颗行星的认知网络进行了七次测试，最终确定它不包含任何腐化。”
languages.original_text: "We cannot trace the source of the signal that activated the Procedure or identify its purpose. The Tech-Priests oppose the idea of studying the Procedure, as it 'violates the sacrament.' Supposedly, the minds of the Magi immersed in the cells are involved in some grand-scale computation. The servants of the Omnissiah have tested the planet's cogitational network seven times with purifying algorithms of varying degrees of severity, proclaiming it clean."

traits.locale_text: “我们无法追踪激活那个程序的信号来源，也无法理解它的含义。技术神甫反对研究这个程序，因为这样的做法‘违反了圣礼’。据推测，那些沉浸在密室里的贤者思维参与了某种大规模的计算活动。欧姆尼塞亚的仆人已经用了多种净化算法对这颗行星的认知网络进行了七次测试，最终确定它不包含任何腐化。”
“我们无法追踪激活它的信号来源，也无法理解它的含义。技术神甫反对研究这个程序，因为这样的做法‘违反了圣礼’。据推测，那些沉浸在密室里的贤者思维参与了某种大规模的计算活动。欧姆尼塞亚的仆人已经用了多种净化算法对认知网络进行了七次测试，最终确定它不包含任何腐化。”

languages.text: «No podemos rastrear el origen de la señal que activó el Procedimiento ni averiguar qué significa. Los tecnosacerdotes se oponen a la idea de estudiarlo, ya que eso supondría "violar el sacramento". Supuestamente, las mentes de los magos inmersos en las celdas participan en una especie de cálculo a gran escala. Los servidores del Omnissiah han puesto a prueba la red cogitativa del planeta siete veces con algoritmos purificadores de diversos grados de severidad, y su conclusión es que está limpia».
languages.original_text: "We cannot trace the source of the signal that activated the Procedure or identify its purpose. The Tech-Priests oppose the idea of studying the Procedure, as it 'violates the sacrament.' Supposedly, the minds of the Magi immersed in the cells are involved in some grand-scale computation. The servants of the Omnissiah have tested the planet's cogitational network seven times with purifying algorithms of varying degrees of severity, proclaiming it clean."

traits.locale_text: «No podemos rastrear el origen de la señal que activó el Procedimiento ni averiguar qué significa. Los tecnosacerdotes se oponen a la idea de estudiarlo, ya que eso supondría "violar el sacramento". Supuestamente, las mentes de los magos inmersos en las celdas participan en una especie de cálculo a gran escala. Los servidores del Omnissiah han puesto a prueba la red cogitativa del planeta siete veces con algoritmos purificadores de diversos grados de severidad, y su conclusión es que está limpia».

languages.text: 「プロシージャーを起動した信号の発信源を突き止めることも、それが何を意味するのかを解明することもできません。技術司祭は"聖餐に反する行為"として、プロシージャーを調査する考えに反対しています。おそらく、セルに没頭されたマゴスの精神は、壮大なスケールの計算に関わっているのでしょう。万機神の従者らは、さまざまな厳格度合の浄化アルゴリズムで思考ネットワークを7回テストし、それがクリーンであると宣言しています」
languages.original_text: "We cannot trace the source of the signal that activated the Procedure or identify its purpose. The Tech-Priests oppose the idea of studying the Procedure, as it 'violates the sacrament.' Supposedly, the minds of the Magi immersed in the cells are involved in some grand-scale computation. The servants of the Omnissiah have tested the planet's cogitational network seven times with purifying algorithms of varying degrees of severity, proclaiming it clean."

traits.locale_text: 「それを起動した信号の発信源を突き止めることも、それが何を意味するのかを解明することもできません。技術司祭は"聖餐に反する行為"として、プロシージャーを調査する考えに反対しています。おそらく、セルに没頭されたマゴスの精神は、壮大なスケールの計算に関わっているのでしょう。万機神の従者らは、さまざまな厳格度合の浄化アルゴリズムで思考ネットワークを7回テストし、それがクリーンであると宣言しています」
「それを起動した信号の発信源を突き止めることも、それが何を意味するのかを解明することもできません。技術司祭は"聖餐に反する行為"として、プロシージャーを調査する考えに反対しています。おそらく、セルに没頭されたマゴスの精神は、壮大なスケールの計算に関わっているのでしょう。万機神の従者らは、さまざまな厳格度合の浄化アルゴリズムで思考ネットワークを7回テストし、それがクリーンであると宣言しています」

languages.text: « Nous ne parvenons pas à remonter à la source du signal qui a activé la Procédure ni à identifier ce qu'il signifie. Les technoprêtres se refusent à mener des recherches sur la Procédure, au prétexte que cela "violerait le sacrement". On suppose que les esprits des magi immergés dans les cellules participent à des calculs à grande échelle. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie ont soumis le réseau cogitationnel de la planète à sept tests différents, en usant d'algorithmes de purification plus ou moins sévères, et l'ont déclaré parfaitement sain. »
languages.original_text: "We cannot trace the source of the signal that activated the Procedure or identify its purpose. The Tech-Priests oppose the idea of studying the Procedure, as it 'violates the sacrament.' Supposedly, the minds of the Magi immersed in the cells are involved in some grand-scale computation. The servants of the Omnissiah have tested the planet's cogitational network seven times with purifying algorithms of varying degrees of severity, proclaiming it clean."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne parvenons pas à remonter à la source du signal qui a activé la Procédure ni à identifier ce qu'il signifie. Les technoprêtres se refusent à mener des recherches sur la Procédure, au prétexte que cela "violerait le sacrement". On suppose que les esprits des magi immergés dans les cellules participent à des calculs à grande échelle. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie ont soumis le réseau cogitationnel de la planète à sept tests différents, en usant d'algorithmes de purification plus ou moins sévères, et l'ont déclaré parfaitement sain. »

languages.text: "Wir können die Quelle des Aktivierungssignals der Prozedur nicht zurückverfolgen und seinen Zweck nicht identifizieren. Die Techpriester sind dagegen, die Prozedur zu studieren, da das angeblich 'gegen das Sakrament verstößt'. Offenbar ist der Verstand der Magi in den Zellen an irgendeiner groß angelegten Berechnung beteiligt. Die Diener des Omnissiah haben das Cogitationsnetzwerk des Planeten sieben Mal durch Läuterungsalgorithmen verschiedener Grade getestet und für rein erklärt."
languages.original_text: "We cannot trace the source of the signal that activated the Procedure or identify its purpose. The Tech-Priests oppose the idea of studying the Procedure, as it 'violates the sacrament.' Supposedly, the minds of the Magi immersed in the cells are involved in some grand-scale computation. The servants of the Omnissiah have tested the planet's cogitational network seven times with purifying algorithms of varying degrees of severity, proclaiming it clean."

traits.locale_text: "Wir können die Quelle des Aktivierungssignals der Prozedur nicht zurückverfolgen und seinen Zweck nicht identifizieren. Die Techpriester sind dagegen, die Prozedur zu studieren, da das angeblich 'gegen das Sakrament verstößt'. Offenbar ist der Verstand der Magi in den Zellen an irgendeiner groß angelegten Berechnung beteiligt. Die Diener des Omnissiah haben das Cogitationsnetzwerk des Planeten sieben Mal durch Läuterungsalgorithmen verschiedener Grade getestet und für rein erklärt."

"Wir können die Quelle des Aktivierungssignals nicht zurückverfolgen und wissen nicht, was es zu bedeuten hat. Die Techpriester sind dagegen, die Prozedur zu erforschen, da das angeblich 'gegen das Sakrament verstößt'. Offenbar ist der Verstand der Magi in den Zellen an irgendeiner großangelegten Berechnung beteiligt. Die Diener des Omnissiah haben das Cogitationsnetzwerk sieben Mal durch Läuterungsalgorithmen verschiedener Schwere getestet und für rein erklärt."

languages.text: "Prosedür'ün başlatılmasına sebep olan sinyalin kaynağını bulamıyor, amacını anlayamıyoruz. Tekno Rahipler, Prosedür'ün incelenmesi fikrine 'kutsala saygısızlık' olacağı için karşı çıkıyor. Güya Magosların zihinleri, hücrelere dalıp büyük çaplı bir bilgisayım işlemine girişmiş. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, gezegenin kavramsayım ağını farklı seviyelerde arındırıcı algoritmalarla yedi defa sınayıp temiz olduğuna kanaat getirmiş."
languages.original_text: "We cannot trace the source of the signal that activated the Procedure or identify its purpose. The Tech-Priests oppose the idea of studying the Procedure, as it 'violates the sacrament.' Supposedly, the minds of the Magi immersed in the cells are involved in some grand-scale computation. The servants of the Omnissiah have tested the planet's cogitational network seven times with purifying algorithms of varying degrees of severity, proclaiming it clean."

traits.locale_text: "Prosedür'ün başlatılmasına sebep olan sinyalin kaynağını bulamıyor, amacını anlayamıyoruz. Tekno Rahipler, Prosedür'ün incelenmesi fikrine 'kutsala saygısızlık' olacağı için karşı çıkıyor. Güya Magosların zihinleri, hücrelere dalıp büyük çaplı bir bilgisayım işlemine girişmiş.
